function.name: Weather_1_GetWeather
function.description: Retrieves the weather forecast for a specified city on a particular date. Note that the provided function is in Python 3 syntax.

city.description: The name of the city for which weather information is requested.

date.description: The date for which weather information is requested, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, the current date is used.
